get.description: Alerts API returns alerts and warnings issued by government agencies (USA, UK, Europe and Rest of the World) as an array if available for the location provided.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Example value: london

get.description: Future weather API method returns weather in a 3 hourly interval in future for a date between 14 days and 300 days from today in the future.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Query parameter based on which data is sent back. It could be following: Latitude and Longitude (Decimal degree) e.g: q=48.8567,2.3508 city name e.g.: q=Paris US zip e.g.: q=10001 UK postcode e.g: q=SW1 Canada postal code e.g: q=G2J metar: e.g: q=metar:EGLL iata:<3 digit airport code> e.g: q=iata:DXB auto:ip IP lookup e.g: q=auto:ip IP address (IPv4 and IPv6 supported) e.g: q=100.0.0.1

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Returns 'condition:text' field in API in the desired language

parameters.name: dt
parameters.description: 'dt' should be between 14 days and 300 days from today in the future in yyyy-MM-dd format (i.e. dt=2023-01-01)

get.description: Current weather or realtime weather API method allows a user to get up to date current weather information in json and xml. The data is returned as a Current Object.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Query parameter based on which data is sent back. It could be following: Latitude and Longitude (Decimal degree) e.g: q=48.8567,2.3508 city name e.g.: q=Paris US zip e.g.: q=10001 UK postcode e.g: q=SW1 Canada postal code e.g: q=G2J metar: e.g: q=metar:EGLL iata:<3 digit airport code> e.g: q=iata:DXB auto:ip IP lookup e.g: q=auto:ip IP address (IPv4 and IPv6 supported) e.g: q=100.0.0.1

get.description: Sports API method allows a user to get listing of all upcoming sports events for football, cricket and golf in json.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Example value: London

get.description: Astronomy API method allows a user to get up to date information for sunrise, sunset, moonrise, moonset, moon phase and illumination in json.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Query parameter based on which data is sent back. It could be following: Latitude and Longitude (Decimal degree) e.g: q=48.8567,2.3508 city name e.g.: q=Paris US zip e.g.: q=10001 UK postcode e.g: q=SW1 Canada postal code e.g: q=G2J metar: e.g: q=metar:EGLL iata:<3 digit airport code> e.g: q=iata:DXB auto:ip IP lookup e.g: q=auto:ip IP address (IPv4 and IPv6 supported) e.g: q=100.0.0.1

parameters.name: dt
parameters.description: Date

get.description: Search or Autocomplete API returns matching cities and towns.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Query parameter based on which data is sent back. It could be following: Latitude and Longitude (Decimal degree) e.g: q=48.8567,2.3508 city name e.g.: q=Paris US zip e.g.: q=10001 UK postcode e.g: q=SW1 Canada postal code e.g: q=G2J metar: e.g: q=metar:EGLL iata:<3 digit airport code> e.g: q=iata:DXB auto:ip IP lookup e.g: q=auto:ip IP address (IPv4 and IPv6 supported) e.g: q=100.0.0.1

get.description: Marine weather API returns upto next 7 day marine and sailing weather forecast and tide data for global marine/sea points.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Query parameter based on which data is sent back. It could be following: Latitude and Longitude (Decimal degree) e.g: q=48.8567,2.3508 city name e.g.: q=Paris US zip e.g.: q=10001 UK postcode e.g: q=SW1 Canada postal code e.g: q=G2J metar: e.g: q=metar:EGLL iata:<3 digit airport code> e.g: q=iata:DXB auto:ip IP lookup e.g: q=auto:ip IP address (IPv4 and IPv6 supported) e.g: q=100.0.0.1

parameters.name: days
parameters.description: Example value: 1

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Example value:

get.description: History weather API method returns historical weather for a date on or after 1st Jan, 2010 (depending upon subscription level) as json.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Query parameter based on which data is sent back. It could be following: Latitude and Longitude (Decimal degree) e.g: q=48.8567,2.3508 city name e.g.: q=Paris US zip e.g.: q=10001 UK postcode e.g: q=SW1 Canada postal code e.g: q=G2J metar: e.g: q=metar:EGLL iata:<3 digit airport code> e.g: q=iata:DXB auto:ip IP lookup e.g: q=auto:ip IP address (IPv4 and IPv6 supported) e.g: q=100.0.0.1

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Returns 'condition:text' field in API in the desired language

parameters.name: hour
parameters.description: Restricting history output to a specific hour in a given day.

parameters.name: dt
parameters.description: For history API 'dt' should be on or after 1st Jan, 2010 in yyyy-MM-dd format

parameters.name: end_dt
parameters.description: Restrict date output for History API method. Should be on or after 1st Jan, 2010. Make sure end_dt is equal to or greater than 'dt'.

get.description: Forecast weather API method returns upto next 14 day weather forecast and weather alert as json. It contains astronomy data, day weather forecast and hourly interval weather information for a given city.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Query parameter based on which data is sent back. It could be following: Latitude and Longitude (Decimal degree) e.g: q=48.8567,2.3508 city name e.g.: q=Paris US zip e.g.: q=10001 UK postcode e.g: q=SW1 Canada postal code e.g: q=G2J metar: e.g: q=metar:EGLL iata:<3 digit airport code> e.g: q=iata:DXB auto:ip IP lookup e.g: q=auto:ip IP address (IPv4 and IPv6 supported) e.g: q=100.0.0.1

parameters.name: days
parameters.description: Number of days of forecast required.

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Returns 'condition:text' field in API in the desired language

parameters.name: dt
parameters.description: If passing 'dt', it should be between today and next 10 day in yyyy-MM-dd format.

get.description: IP Lookup API method allows a user to get up to date information for an IP address in json.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: e.g: q=auto:ip IP address (IPv4 and IPv6 supported) e.g: q=100.0.0.1

get.description: Time Zone API method allows a user to get up to date time zone and local time information in json.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Query parameter based on which data is sent back. It could be following: Latitude and Longitude (Decimal degree) e.g: q=48.8567,2.3508 city name e.g.: q=Paris US zip e.g.: q=10001 UK postcode e.g: q=SW1 Canada postal code e.g: q=G2J metar: e.g: q=metar:EGLL iata:<3 digit airport code> e.g: q=iata:DXB auto:ip IP lookup e.g: q=auto:ip IP address (IPv4 and IPv6 supported) e.g: q=100.0.0.1
